column4: UPDATE 4-U.S. sees national security risk from Broadcom's Qualcomm deal
column5: March 6 A U.S. government national security panel has identified potential risks that warrant a full investigation of Singapore-based Broadcom Ltd's $117 billion bid for chipmaker Qualcomm Inc  a senior U.S. Treasury official said in a letter to the companies on Monday.

column4: US STOCKS-Wall St gains even as trade war worries dominate
column5: * North Korea willing to hold talks with U.S. on denuclearization

column4: Qualcomm in talks to settle patent dispute with Huawei: WSJ
column5: Chipmaker Qualcomm Inc  is in talks to settle a patent dispute with China's Huawei Technologies Co [HWT.UL] and could reach an agreement in the coming weeks  the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday  citing people familiar with the matter.

column4: UPDATE 1-Qualcomm in talks to settle patent dispute with Huawei -WSJ
